tool_description: Detects potentially fake, spam, or low-quality reviews using machine learning models and heuristic analysis of review patterns.

review_texts.description: Array of review text content for spam detection

review_ratings.description: Array of review ratings corresponding to texts

reviewer_ids.description: Array of reviewer identifiers for pattern analysis

review_dates.description: Array of review timestamps for temporal analysis

check_duplicates.description: Whether to check for duplicate or near-duplicate reviews

analyze_patterns.description: Whether to analyze reviewer behavior patterns

error_messages: Array length mismatch: review_texts and review_ratings must have the same length. Ensure data alignment is maintained.
Invalid spam_threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0. Higher thresholds are more conservative in spam detection.
Insufficient data for pattern analysis: Pattern analysis requires at least reviewer_ids or review_dates. Disable analyze_patterns if unavailable.
Invalid date format: review_dates must be in ISO 8601 format. Check timestamp formatting from data source.
Processing limit exceeded: Maximum 2000 reviews per batch. Large datasets should be split for optimal performance.
usage: Provide review_texts and review_ratings arrays. Optionally include reviewer_ids and review_dates for enhanced detection. Configure thresholds and analysis options as needed.

spam_probabilities.description: Spam probability scores for each review (0-1 scale)

spam_classifications.description: Boolean spam classification for each review

spam_reasons.description: Reason codes for reviews classified as spam

duplicate_groups.description: Groups of duplicate or near-duplicate review indices

spam_summary.description: Overall spam detection summary with counts and percentages
